short_description: simon's nyc is a hardware store based in town of east hampton, new york, united states.
long_description: simon's has been immersed in new york city's ever changing architectural design community for more than 110 years. we are privileged to collaborate with nyc's best architects, designers and contractors from the early stages of architectural design all the way through to completion of a home renovation or custom home build out. today, simon's through our 4 showrooms offers our customers a vast selection of luxury hardware and plumbing fixtures from more than 400 us and european manufacturers. we carry prestigious brand names such as fantini, dornbracht, toto, rocky mountain hardware, classic brass, armarc martin, omnia, fsb, furniture guild and many more. simon's has a huge in-stock inventory of more than 200,000 unique products for our customer's ready access. we have also partnered with a certain high caliber manufacturers to make custom door hardware and plumbing fixtures, to satisfy our customer's requirements for that perfect bespoke product that is unique to their newly renovated home.

generated_description: simons hardware & bath is a new york city-based company specializing in decorative and architectural hardware, plumbing fixtures, fittings, and furnishings. established in 1908, the company serves architects, designers, developers, contractors, and discerning consumers. simons hardware & bath operates four showrooms and offers a wide range of products from over 400 us and european manufacturers. their inventory includes items such as faucets, sinks, shower systems, and custom door hardware. the company is known for its extensive product knowledge and technical expertise, providing solutions throughout the entire home renovation process.
